Posts.Content: cdemers1 wrote: My grandmother just found out she had cancer. She is unsure of her options and is afraid to ask. Question 1- If you have had radation between your breast can you have it on your breast. Question 2- Can you have Chemotherapy done if you have a pacemaker. I believe she has cancer in the right breast and she is not sure exactly. I am not sure it makes a difference. Any info would be awsome. Thanks Tina Log in to post a reply
